items.title: Austrian Energy Group Eyes Blockchain With Vienna Test
items.description: Wien Energie intends to pilot blockchain products in a sustainably designed Viennese urban district this year.

items.title: O Canada! Here’s Why This Just-Launched Blockchain ETF Isn’t Concerned About Weak Crypto Prices
items.description:
Canada’s Harvest Portfolios Group Inc. just launched their Blockchain Technologies ETF despite weak market sentiment. When equities markets pull back and sentiment weakens, we often see companies that planned to conduct an initial public offering (IPO) delay their offering in favor of waiting for a recovery and an increased (or, perhaps more accurately, improved) market sentiment. Improved sentiment normally results in increased participation which, ultimately, translates to a higher IPO price and a higher market

Read More

The post O Canada! Here’s Why This Just-Launched Blockchain ETF Isn’t Concerned About Weak Crypto Prices appeared first on Bitcoinist.com.

items.title: Reddit Cofounder, Alexis Ohanian, Takes Backseat to Focus on Blockchain Investments
items.description:
Alexis Ohanian has stated today that he will no longer perform day to day duties at the website he cofounded, Reddit. Instead, the 34-year-old will focus his energies on his venture capital fund, Initialized Capital. Ohanian will continue to sit on the board for Reddit but will spend more time seeking investment opportunities in the … Continue reading Reddit Cofounder, Alexis Ohanian, Takes Backseat to Focus on Blockchain Investments

The post Reddit Cofounder, Alexis Ohanian, Takes Backseat to Focus on Blockchain Investments appeared first on NewsBTC.

items.title: CFTC’s Quintenz: ‘Bitcoin and Blockchain Are Transformative’
items.description:
The post CFTC’s Quintenz: ‘Bitcoin and Blockchain Are Transformative’ appeared first on CCN

The CFTC doesn’t want to interfere with bitcoin or the blockchain. In fact, Brian Quintenz, Commissioner of the Commodities Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), envisions a future not only with bitcoin and blockchain in it but also with them having a transformative effect, saying the regulator has no intentions of standing in the way of innovation. items.title: CoinDesk Releases 2018 Bitcoin and Blockchain Industry Report
items.description: Credit card-driven crypto buying is rare, and ICOs pale compared to airdrops and chain forks. Find these and other insights in our quarterly report.

items.title: Ripple Blockchain Network Adds China Payments Provider
items.description: China-based payment service LianLian has said it will use Ripple's xCurrent blockchain solution for cross-border transactions.

items.title: Win-Win for Webcam Industry as Live Stars Introduce Blockchain Power
Japan Net Bank And Fujitsu Trial Blockchain With Mijin And Hyperledger
items.description:
Japanese blockchain startup Tech Bureau has announced that Japan Net Bank and Fujitsu are testing blockchain technology integrations using Mijin, Tech Bureau’s private blockchain platform utilizing the NEM protocol, and the Hyperledger platform. The proof-of-concept project will focus on assessing the practicality of using blockchain technology for a paperless system for contract administration. It is […]

This post Japan Net Bank And Fujitsu Trial Blockchain With Mijin And Hyperledger first appeared on Coinjournal.

items.title: IBM-Maersk Blockchain Project Adds Logistics Provider Agility
items.description: Agility will share and receive information about shipments through the blockchain in hopes of reducing the cost of administration and documentation.

items.title: The Downside of Tracking Bitcoin on the Blockchain
items.description: Tracking funds on the blockchain may help catch crooks, but such snooping undermines one of the most important characteristics of money: Fungibility.

items.title: Cardano Price Analysis – ADA/USD Breaking Through $0.3550
items.description:
Key Highlights:

Cardano’s price recovered gradually during today’s session, now trading at about $0.3555 ADA was able to hold a support level around $0.3000, now forming a bullish trend line ADA fought off several lows in the last few hours, now testing a resistance of $0.3600 Cardano Breaking Through $0.3555

ADA price has recently broken through the $0.3555 level, which means it is now above the previously established resistance of $0.3380. Now, the coin is on a bullish trend testing a resistance of $0.3600, so investors will need to check if that holds for it to ...
